      • getRoute

        public Route getRoute(int userId,
                      int travelId,
                      int routeId)
               throws DataAccessException
        Retrieve a route object from the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - The Id of the user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        routeId - The Id of the route
        Returns:
        A route object that belongs to the user
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails
        See Also:
        Route

                       Route route)
                throws DataAccessException
        Insert a route into the database
        Parameters:
        userId - The Id of the user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        route - A route object representing the new route
        Returns:

      • existsRoute

        public boolean existsRoute(int userId,
                           int travelId,
                           Route route)
                    throws DataAccessException
        Check if a route already exists in the database. The id field will not be filled in, so every field must be the same.
        Parameters:
        userId - The Id of a user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        route - A route object
        Returns:
        If the route already exists
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - This is thrown when something went wrong with the database

      • hasEqualRouteEventTypes

        public boolean hasEqualRouteEventTypes(Set<EventType> types,
                                       int userId,
                                       int travelId,
                                       int routeId)
                                throws DataAccessException
        Check if the set of event types is equal to the event types of the route in the db
        Parameters:
        types - Set of the types of events
        userId - The Id of the user
        travelId - The Id of the travel
        routeId - The Id of the route
        Returns:
        true if the set of event types is equal
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails

      • hasEqualWaypoints

        public boolean hasEqualWaypoints(Set<Coordinate> waypoints,
                                 int userId,
                                 int travelId)
                          throws DataAccessException
        Check if the set of waypoints is equal to the waypoints of the route in the db
        Parameters:
        waypoints - Set of the waypoints
        userId - The Id of the user
        travelId - The Id of the travel
        Returns:
        true if the set of waypoints is equal
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails
